subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Jon Niese, a key pitching staff pillar, left the mound in pain, and the injury seemed to complicate the Mets’ plan to adopt a six-man rotation for the near future.
snippet: Jon Niese, a key pitching staff pillar, left the mound in pain, and the injury seemed to complicate the Mets’ plan to adopt a six-man rotation for the near future.
